name: Deploy to server

on: push

jobs:
  first_jobs:
    name: Despliegue con GitHub Action
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    env:
      NAME: EjemploDeploy

    outputs:
      carnet: 123456
      nombre: ${{ steps.step_1.outputs.my_variable }}

    steps:
      - name: Hola Mundo
        run: echo "Hola Mundo ${{ env.NAME }}"

      - name: Listar directorios
        run: ls -al

      - name: Action
        uses: actions/checkout@v5

      - name: Listar directorios despues del action
        run: ls -al

      - name: Adicionar variable a $GITHUB_OUTPUT
        id: step_1
        run: echo "my_variable=Juan Perez" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT

      - name: Obtener mensaje
        run: echo "${{ steps.step_1.outputs.my_variable }}"

  second_jobs:
    if: ${{ github.ref == 'refs/heads/master' }}
    needs: first_jobs
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Mostrar carnet
        run: echo "El carnet es ${{ needs.first_jobs.outputs.carnet }}"

      - name: Mostrar nombre
        run: echo "El nombre es ${{ needs.first_jobs.outputs.nombre }}"

  third_jobs:
    name: Tercer Job
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Generar archivo
        run: echo "Archivo prueba, hola" >> test.log

      - name: Subir artefacto
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: archivo-test
          path: test.log

  fourth_jobs:
    name: Cuarto Job
    needs: third_jobs
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Descargar artefacto
        uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: archivo-test

      - name: Cat file
        run: cat test.log
